definition: hard power (i.e. military and economic power)

sentences.english: It is possible to use impervious soybean seed to preserve soybean germplasm.
sentences.chinese: 這就使硬實種子在大豆種質保存中應用成爲可能。

sentences.english: Hard solid wood as doorsill with anti-slippy aluminium covering.
sentences.chinese: 硬實木爲包括門檻與反斯利皮鋁。

sentences.english: The non-imbibing seed of the eighth day was called hard seed.
sentences.chinese: 將第八天尚未吸脹的作爲硬實種子。
